# BIOinformatics: Handy and Practical {.unnumbered}

This is a compilation of bioinformatics knowledge at CCMAR-Algarve. First series of hands-on workshop happened in *Spring 2025*.

We aim to equip researchers with essential data analysis skills for bioinformatics, and create base for bioinformatics in Algarve. Do you want advertize your skills, contribute to the community with your workshop or simply become a supportter. Do not hesitate to contact dpalecek[at].ualg.pt

To visit the source files for the workshops and the webpage, visit our [Github](https://github.com/Py-ualg/biohap).
To learn more about Quarto books visit <https://quarto.org/docs/books>.
